thread.title: Virginia Tech students mosh to ‘Enter Sandman’ after beating No. 12 Virgina
thread.title_full: Virginia Tech students mosh to ‘Enter Sandman’ after beating No. 12 Virgina

author: Ricky O'Donnell
title: Virginia Tech students mosh to ‘Enter Sandman’ after beating No. 12 Virgina
text:
This rules. Also, listen to newer music, kids.
Virginia Tech moshes after beating Virginia Congratulations, Virginia Tech! You just knocked off No. 12 Virginia in double overtime on your home floor. It’s not just a victory over your biggest rival, it’s also a huge boost to your NCAA tournament resume. How will you celebrate?
Turns out the answer is: moshing to Metallica’s “Enter Sandman”. Who knew?
This song came out in 1991. Current college students were mostly born between 1995-1999. Fortunately (?), it lives forever on alternative rock radio alongside “Smells Like Teen Spirit”, anything from “Ten” and that one Alice In Chains song.
Kids, my advice: listen to Rancid 2000 and never look back.
